19 ROSEnvironment::ROSEnvironment(ros::NodeHandle nh) : nh_(nh){
20  odom = nh_.subscribe("/odom", 1000, &ROSEnvironment::odomCallBack, this);
21  laser_scan = nh_.subscribe("/scan", 1000, &ROSEnvironment::laserScanCallBack, this);
22  pub_vel = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 3, false);
23 }

31 void ROSEnvironment::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg){
32  robotOdomMtx_.lock();
33  bot_odom = *msg;
34  robotOdomMtx_.unlock();
35 
36 }

38 void ROSEnvironment::laserScanCallBack(const sensor_msgs::LaserScanConstPtr &msg){
39  laserScanMtx_.lock();
40  bot_laser_scan = *msg;
41  laserScanMtx_.unlock();
42 
43 }

45  nav_msgs::Odometry ROSEnvironment::returnOdom(){

50 void ROSEnvironment::sendCmd(int linear_x, int linear_y, int linear_z, int angular_x, int angular_y, int angular_z)
51 {
52  bot_vel.linear.x = linear_x;
53  bot_vel.linear.y = linear_y;
54  bot_vel.linear.z = linear_z;
55  bot_vel.angular.x = angular_x;
56  bot_vel.angular.y = angular_y;
57  bot_vel.angular.z = angular_z;
58  pub_vel.publish(bot_vel);
59 }
